meanings.definition: The act of risking money on the outcome of an event or game.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the excitement of betting on horse races.
meanings.sent2: Many people engage in betting during sports events.
meanings.sent3: My friend's constant betting on card games always keeps us entertained.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a game of betting, you never know what the outcome will be.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of betting adds an extra layer of fun to the game.

meanings.definition: Making a prediction or wager on a particular outcome.
meanings.sent1: His accurate betting on the election results surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She placed her betting on the winning team of the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat's betting on catching the laser pointer always ends in a chase.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, we are constantly making bets on our future.
meanings.sent5: The success of his betting strategy relies on careful analysis and intuition.
